name: Raceway
description:
Animal go-carting at its finest! Grab your friends, pick your favourite cute animal racer, and go for gold! This full game features:

- 8 cute animals with themed carts,
- 20 varied tracks.
- 5 derby arenas,
- 8 tournaments,
- 3 unlockable mini-games: Soccer, Darts and Bowling!
- Network multiplayer for up to 8 players,
- 2 player split-screen play on iPad.
